potion.title: Potion
potion.description: Restores a small amount of health.

megapotion.title: Mega Potion
megapotion.description: Restores a moderate amount of health.

maxpotion.title: Max Potion
maxpotion.description: Fully restores health and maximizes the size of your Health Gauge.

ancientpotion.title: Ancient Potion
ancientpotion.description: Fully restores health and maximizes the size of your Health and Stamina Gauges.

herbalmedicine.title: Herbal Medicine
herbalmedicine.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

nulberry.title: Nulberry
nulberry.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

energydrink.title: Energy Drink
energydrink.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

ration.title: Ration
ration.description: Food that restores a bit of stamina.

raresteak.title: Rare Steak
raresteak.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina. This one's still red in the middle.

well-donesteak.title: Well-done Steak
well-donesteak.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

burntmeat.title: Burnt Meat
burntmeat.description: Provides a small boost to your stamina. Can be eaten quickly.

cooldrink.title: Cool Drink
cooldrink.description: Provides temporary relief from extreme heat.

nutrients.title: Nutrients
nutrients.description: Very slightly increases your maximum health level.

meganutrients.title: Mega Nutrients
meganutrients.description: Slightly increases your maximum health level.

immunizer.title: Immunizer
immunizer.description: Boosts your natural ability to heal.

asterajerky.title: Astera Jerky
asterajerky.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

dashjuice.title: Dash Juice
dashjuice.description: Dulls one's sense of exhaustion. Reduces stamina depletion for a time.

mightseed.title: Might Seed
mightseed.description: Temporarily strengthens your attacks when ingested by improving energy flow.

demondrug.title: Demondrug
demondrug.description: Boosts your attack power by filling you with�guess what?�demonic strength.

megademondrug.title: Mega Demondrug
megademondrug.description: Boosts your attack power even more than a regular Demondrug.

mightpill.title: Might Pill
mightpill.description: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!

adamantseed.title: Adamant Seed
adamantseed.description: Temporarily raises your defense when ingested by hardening tissue.

armorskin.title: Armorskin
armorskin.description: Boosts your defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

megaarmorskin.title: Mega Armorskin
megaarmorskin.description: Boosts your defense even more than a regular armorskin.

adamantpill.title: Adamant Pill
adamantpill.description: Temporarily makes your skin as hard as adamant. Potent!

lifepowder.title: Lifepowder
lifepowder.description: Produces a healing cloud in the area around the user.

herbalpowder.title: Herbal Powder
herbalpowder.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that restores health and neutralizes poison.

demonpowder.title: Demon Powder
demonpowder.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens attacks.

hardshellpowder.title: Hardshell Powder
hardshellpowder.description: A mysterious powder that produces a cloud around the area that temporarily strengthens defense.

honey.title: Honey
honey.description: Highly nutritious honey. Combine this with Potions to craft Mega Potions for maximum potency.

fireherb.title: Fire Herb
fireherb.description: A wondrous, flammable plant. Useful for crafting explosives.

flowfern.title: Flowfern
flowfern.description: This plant's leaves store a great amount of water. A component for making Water Ammo.

snowherb.title: Snow Herb
snowherb.description: A plant that radiates ice-cold air. Use in combinations to create freeze ammo.

sleepherb.title: Sleep Herb
sleepherb.description: A plant containing sleeping agents. Used to craft tranquilizers.

ivy.title: Ivy
ivy.description: A lightweight and extremely strong plant. Used to make nets for pitfall traps.

smokenut.title: Smokenut
smokenut.description: A nut that produces a copious amount of smoke. Combine with other items to create smoke with various properties.

dragonfellberry.title: Dragonfell Berry
dragonfellberry.description: A mysterious berry, rumored for eons to be loathed by dragons. Required to craft Dragon Ammo.

bluemushroom.title: Blue Mushroom
bluemushroom.description: A mushroom infused with power-enhancing effects. Used in restorative items.

mandragora.title: Mandragora
mandragora.description: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Beware. Required to craft Max Potions.

nitroshroom.title: Nitroshroom
nitroshroom.description: A hard-to-find mushroom with the power to generate blazing heat. Required to craft Gunpowder.

devil'sblight.title: Devil's Blight
devil'sblight.description: A very rare fungus that pulses with extreme heat. Add to a barrel bomb for a dramatically stronger blast.

parashroom.title: Parashroom
parashroom.description: A mushroom that induces paralysis. Required to craft Tranq Bombs.

toadstool.title: Toadstool
toadstool.description: A poisonous fungus. Can be used as a toxin for knives.

exciteshroom.title: Exciteshroom
exciteshroom.description: This one has a very strange aroma. Is it edible? Only one way to find out! Required to craft Farcasters.

bitterbug.title: Bitterbug
bitterbug.description: A sharp-tasting bug with innate healing abilities. Used as an ingredient in many medicines.

flashbug.title: Flashbug
flashbug.description: An insect that emits a powerful flash when it dies. Required to craft Flash Pods.

godbug.title: Godbug
godbug.description: An insect said to live a millennium. Combine it with other items to add their properties to the powder.

thunderbug.title: Thunderbug
thunderbug.description: An insect that emits electricity when struck. Required to craft Shock Traps and Thunder Ammo.

baitbug.title: Baitbug
baitbug.description: An insect used as fishing bait. A fish favorite, it practically races down the nearest gilly gullet.

kelbihorn.title: Kelbi Horn
kelbihorn.description: While not practical when forging equipment, Kelbi horns are a vital component of many items.

dashextract.title: Dash Extract
dashextract.description: A mysterious substance culled from certain monsters that increases endurance.

nourishingextract.title: Nourishing Extract
nourishingextract.description: Can be obtained from certain large monsters. Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

screamersac.title: Screamer Sac
screamersac.description: A monster organ that emits an earsplitting sonic blast when ruptured. Used to craft screamer pods.

catalyst.title: Catalyst
catalyst.description: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.

tranqbomb.title: Tranq Bomb
tranqbomb.description: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Can be slammed against the ground.

flashpod.title: Flash Pod
flashpod.description: Slinger ammo that flashes brightly on impact. Fire it right under a monster's nose to blind it.

screamerpod.title: Screamer Pod
screamerpod.description: Used as ammo for your slinger. Emits a harsh, high-frequency sound that can disrupt sensitive monsters.

smokebomb.title: Smoke Bomb
smokebomb.description: Creates a large cloud of smoke wherever it lands.

poisonsmokebomb.title: Poison Smoke Bomb
poisonsmokebomb.description: Releases a toxic cloud of mist when used. Also popular as a household bug bomb.

farcaster.title: Farcaster
farcaster.description: Call for a wingdrake to transport you to the nearest camp. Can also be used during battles.

rawmeat.title: Raw Meat
rawmeat.description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

poisonedmeat.title: Poisoned Meat
poisonedmeat.description: Raw meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

tingedmeat.title: Tinged Meat
tingedmeat.description: Raw meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.

druggedmeat.title: Drugged Meat
druggedmeat.description: Raw meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes great bait for traps.

gunpowder.title: Gunpowder
gunpowder.description: A dangerous substance that explodes when struck or heated.

bouncebomb.title: Bounce Bomb
bouncebomb.description: Launches into the air when set. This modified bomb requires skill to use.

megabouncebomb.title: Mega Bounce Bomb
megabouncebomb.description: An improved version of the bounce bomb. Requires some skill to use.

largebarrel.title: Large Barrel
largebarrel.description: A large, empty barrel. Combine with gunpowder to make it into a bomb.

largebarrelbomb.title: Large Barrel Bomb
largebarrelbomb.description: A powerful bomb triggered by external physical impact.

megabarrelbomb.title: Mega Barrel Bomb
megabarrelbomb.description: An upgraded large barrel bomb. Effective against large monsters.

spiderweb.title: Spider Web
spiderweb.description: A very sticky web. Used to craft pitfall traps.

net.title: Net
net.description: A sturdy net that supports a certain amount of weight without breaking. Perfect for pitfall traps.

traptool.title: Trap Tool
traptool.description: A must-have item for putting together pitfall traps and other kinds of traps.

pitfalltrap.title: Pitfall Trap
pitfalltrap.description: A trap for catching certain large monsters. It is tripped by a heavy weight.

shocktrap.title: Shock Trap
shocktrap.description: A trap that immobilizes a target. Use it to capture monsters.

rolled-updung.title: Rolled-up Dung
rolled-updung.description: A ball of condensed monster dung. Used to make dung pods for your slinger.

dung.title: Dung
dung.description: Exudes a prodigious smell. Used to make ammo for your slinger called dung pods.

dungpod.title: Dung Pod
dungpod.description: Slinger ammo that releases a strong odor on impact. Causes certain monsters to flee.

arowanabait.title: Arowana Bait
arowanabait.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Arowana family.

gunpowderfishbait.title: Gunpowderfish Bait
gunpowderfishbait.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Gunpowderfish family.

goldenfishbait.title: Goldenfish Bait
goldenfishbait.description: A ball of bait favored by fish of the Goldenfish family.

boomerang.title: Boomerang
boomerang.description: An unusually-shaped weapon from abroad that returns to its user when thrown.

binoculars.title: Binoculars
binoculars.description: Allows you to see farther and observe from a distance.

powercharm.title: Powercharm
powercharm.description: An amulet that strengthens attacks. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.

powertalon.title: Powertalon
powertalon.description: A charm that strengthens attacks. Its effects are amplified by the dragon parts it contains.

armorcharm.title: Armorcharm
armorcharm.description: An amulet that increases defense. Just carrying this hardens your skin like stone.

armortalon.title: Armortalon
armortalon.description: A charm that increases defense. Its effects are amplified by the dragon parts it contains.

needleberry.title: Needleberry
needleberry.description: A nut covered in needle-like spines. Used to make spread ammo.

blastnut.title: Blastnut
blastnut.description: A nut used to make sticky ammo.

dragonstrikenut.title: Dragonstrike Nut
dragonstrikenut.description: A nut that explodes on impact. Used to make wyvern ammo.

latchberry.title: Latchberry
latchberry.description: A nut that bears a spiral groove. Used to make pierce ammo.

bomberry.title: Bomberry
bomberry.description: A nut that ruptures on impact. Used to make cluster bombs.

flamenut.title: Flamenut
flamenut.description: Used to make gunpowder that increases ammo firepower.

blazenut.title: Blazenut
blazenut.description: Used to make gunpowder that greatly increases ammo firepower.

gunpowderlevel2.title: Gunpowder Level 2
gunpowderlevel2.description: Combustible powder. Combine with level 1 ammo to raise its level.

gunpowderlevel3.title: Gunpowder Level 3
gunpowderlevel3.description: Highly combustible powder. Combine with level 1 ammo to raise its level.

whetfishfin.title: Whetfish Fin
whetfishfin.description: A fish fin used to sharpen weapons. Restores sharpness greatly, but good for fewer uses than a whetstone.

whetfishfin+.title: Whetfish Fin+
whetfishfin+.description: A fish fin used to sharpen weapons. Works better than a whetstone, and can be reused if you're lucky.

sushifishscale.title: Sushifish Scale
sushifishscale.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

greatsushifishscale.title: Great Sushifish Scale
greatsushifishscale.description: Scale from a Great Sushifish. Eat to get large health boost, a natural healing boost, and treat bleeding.

gunpowderfishscale.title: Gunpowderfish Scale
gunpowderfishscale.description: The scales of a Gunpowderfish. Combine with a large barrel bomb to dramatically increase its firepower.

greatgunpowderfishscale.title: Great Gunpowderfish Scale
greatgunpowderfishscale.description: The scales of a Great Gunpowderfish. Combine with a large barrel bomb to make a mega barrel bomb.

burstarowanascale.title: Burst Arowana Scale
burstarowanascale.description: The scales of a Burst Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a large amount of level 2 gunpowder.

greatburstarowanascale.title: Great Burst Arowana Scale
greatburstarowanascale.description: The scales of a Great Burst Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a vast amount of level 2 gunpowder.

bombarowanascale.title: Bomb Arowana Scale
bombarowanascale.description: The scales of a Bomb Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a large amount of Lv3 gunpowder.

greatbombarowanascale.title: Great Bomb Arowana Scale
greatbombarowanascale.description: The scales of a Great Bomb Arowana. Combine with fire herb to make a vast amount of Lv3 gunpowder.

whetstone.title: Whetstone
whetstone.description: A standard-sized whetstone. Use it to restore a weapon's sharpness.

capturenet.title: Capture Net
capturenet.description: A net that can be fired from your slinger. Use it to capture small creatures.

bbqspit.title: BBQ Spit
bbqspit.description: Just what you need to cook meat. A must-have item for any hungry hunter.

ghilliemantle.title: Ghillie Mantle
ghilliemantle.description: Conceal yourself from view temporarily. The effect ends if you perform an attack or take damage.

temporalmantle.title: Temporal Mantle
temporalmantle.description: Nullify damage from powerful attacks by automatically evading.

healthbooster.title: Health Booster
healthbooster.description: Once spiked into the ground, it emits a healing cloud that gradually restores the health of anyone who stands in it.

rocksteadymantle.title: Rocksteady Mantle
rocksteadymantle.description: Stands firm against certain attacks, and gives you protection against wind pressure, roars, tremors. Also lessens damage.

challengermantle.title: Challenger Mantle
challengermantle.description: Attracts monsters to you, making it easier to lure them to a favorable position.

vitalitymantle.title: Vitality Mantle
vitalitymantle.description: Nullifies a set amount of damage. The effect ends if more than that amount is taken.

fireproofmantle.title: Fireproof Mantle
fireproofmantle.description: Reduces fire element damage and nullifies fireblight, blastblight, and heat damage.

waterproofmantle.title: Waterproof Mantle
waterproofmantle.description: Reduces water element damage, nullifies waterblight and mud. Lets you wade through deep water easier.

iceproofmantle.title: Iceproof Mantle
iceproofmantle.description: Reduces ice element damage and nullifies iceblight.

thunderproofmantle.title: Thunderproof Mantle
thunderproofmantle.description: Reduces thunder element damage. Nullifies thunderblight and paralysis.

dragonproofmantle.title: Dragonproof Mantle
dragonproofmantle.description: Reduces dragon element damage. Nullifies dragonblight while raising dragon element attack.

cleanserbooster.title: Cleanser Booster
cleanserbooster.description: Once spiked into the ground, it emits a healing cloud that cures any abnormal status of anyone who stands in it.

glidermantle.title: Glider Mantle
glidermantle.description: Extends air time when jumping, lets you ride on strong winds, and makes it easier to mount monsters.

evasionmantle.title: Evasion Mantle
evasionmantle.description: Extends the invulnerability window of evasive actions. Dodge attacks at the last minute for an attack boost.

impactmantle.title: Impact Mantle
impactmantle.description: Adds a stun value to most attacks, and enhances the effect of attacks which cause stun.

apothecarymantle.title: Apothecary Mantle
apothecarymantle.description: Increases the likelihood of weapons with abnormal status attacks to contribute to status buildup.

immunitymantle.title: Immunity Mantle
immunitymantle.description: Clears all abnormal statuses and grants immunity from them for a limited amount of time.

affinitybooster.title: Affinity Booster
affinitybooster.description: Once spiked into the ground, it emits a cloud of mist that boosts affinity for you and surrounding teammates.

banditmantle.title: Bandit Mantle
banditmantle.description: Makes attacks against large monsters drop rare and valuable trade-in items.

normalammo1.title: Normal Ammo 1
normalammo1.description: Ammo for novices. Gets the job done, but it doesn't pack much oomph.

normalammo2.title: Normal Ammo 2
normalammo2.description: Non-specialized ammo. More powerful than Normal Ammo 1. Capacity: 99

normalammo3.title: Normal Ammo 3
normalammo3.description: Ammo made with high-quality gunpowder. Each shot packs considerable punch. Capacity: 99

pierceammo1.title: Pierce Ammo 1
pierceammo1.description: Armor-piercing ammo that deals multiple hits to some monsters. Capacity: 60

pierceammo2.title: Pierce Ammo 2
pierceammo2.description: High-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals more hits than Pierce Ammo 1. Capacity: 60

pierceammo3.title: Pierce Ammo 3
pierceammo3.description: Max-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals numerous hits. Capacity: 60

spreadammo1.title: Spread Ammo 1
spreadammo1.description: Ammo that covers a wide area. Deals multiple hits at close range. Capacity: 80

spreadammo2.title: Spread Ammo 2
spreadammo2.description: High-grade ammo that covers a wide area. Deals more hits than Spread Ammo 1. Capacity: 70

spreadammo3.title: Spread Ammo 3
spreadammo3.description: Max-grade ammo that covers a wide area and deals numerous hits. Capacity: 60

stickyammo1.title: Sticky Ammo 1
stickyammo1.description: Powerful ammo that lodges in a target and explodes. Also stuns. Capacity: 9

stickyammo2.title: Sticky Ammo 2
stickyammo2.description: Very powerful ammo that lodges in a target and explodes. Also stuns. Capacity: 9

stickyammo3.title: Sticky Ammo 3
stickyammo3.description: Extremely powerful ammo that lodges in a target and explodes. Also stuns. Capacity: 9

clusterbomb1.title: Cluster Bomb 1
clusterbomb1.description: Ammo that fragments into three shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire! Capacity: 3

clusterbomb2.title: Cluster Bomb 2
clusterbomb2.description: Ammo that fragments into four shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire! Capacity: 3

clusterbomb3.title: Cluster Bomb 3
clusterbomb3.description: Ammo that fragments into five shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire! Capacity: 3

flamingammo.title: Flaming Ammo
flamingammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to fire. Capacity: 60

waterammo.title: Water Ammo
waterammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to water. Capacity: 60

thunderammo.title: Thunder Ammo
thunderammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to thunder. Capacity: 60

freezeammo.title: Freeze Ammo
freezeammo.description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters susceptible to ice. Capacity: 60

dragonammo.title: Dragon Ammo
dragonammo.description: Elderseal-imbued ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to dragon. Capacity: 3

poisonammo1.title: Poison Ammo 1
poisonammo1.description: Poisons target, but may require several shots. Capacity: 12

poisonammo2.title: Poison Ammo 2
poisonammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that inflicts poison. Some targets require multiple shots. Capacity: 12

paralysisammo1.title: Paralysis Ammo 1
paralysisammo1.description: Ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots. Capacity: 12

paralysisammo2.title: Paralysis Ammo 2
paralysisammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots. Capacity: 8

sleepammo1.title: Sleep Ammo 1
sleepammo1.description: Ammo that induces sleep. Some targets require multiple shots. Capacity: 12

sleepammo2.title: Sleep Ammo 2
sleepammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that induces sleep. Some targets require multiple shots. Capacity: 8

exhaustammo1.title: Exhaust Ammo 1
exhaustammo1.description: Ammo that drains a monster's stamina. Capacity: 12

exhaustammo2.title: Exhaust Ammo 2
exhaustammo2.description: Enhanced ammo that drains a monster's stamina. Capacity: 8

recoverammo1.title: Recover Ammo 1
recoverammo1.description: Ammo that restores a small amount of health to an ally upon impact. Capacity: 12

recoverammo2.title: Recover Ammo 2
recoverammo2.description: Ammo that restores a moderate amount of health to an ally upon impact. Capacity: 12

wyvernammo.title: Wyvern Ammo
wyvernammo.description: Ammo created through years of research into Wyvern's Fire. Capacity: 5

slicingammo.title: Slicing Ammo
slicingammo.description: Ammo that ejects sharp blades on impact, which can sever tails. Capacity: 30

tranqammo.title: Tranq Ammo
tranqammo.description: Bowgun ammo used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. Capacity: 8

demonammo.title: Demon Ammo
demonammo.description: Ammo that fills the target with savage amounts of strength. Capacity: 5

armorammo.title: Armor Ammo
armorammo.description: Ammo that makes the target's skin as hard as stone. Capacity: 5

close-rangecoating.title: Close-range Coating
close-rangecoating.description: Arrows designed to deal more damage to nearby targets, at the cost of a reduced maximum range.

emptyphial.title: Empty Phial
emptyphial.description: A regular old empty phial. Nothing more, nothing less.

powercoating.title: Power Coating
powercoating.description: An arrow coating that increases the attack power of arrows. Capacity: 50

poisoncoating.title: Poison Coating
poisoncoating.description: An arrow coating that applies poison effects to arrows. Capacity: 20

paralysiscoating.title: Paralysis Coating
paralysiscoating.description: An arrow coating that applies paralysis effects to arrows. Capacity: 20

sleepcoating.title: Sleep Coating
sleepcoating.description: An arrow coating that induces sleep. Capacity: 20

blastcoating.title: Blast Coating
blastcoating.description: An arrow coating that applies explosive powder to arrows. Capacity: 20

first-aidmed.title: First-aid Med
first-aidmed.description: Restores a small amount of health. (Supply Item)

first-aidmed+.title: First-aid Med+
first-aidmed+.description: Restores a moderate amount of health. (Supply Item)

ezration.title: EZ Ration
ezration.description: Restores a small amount of stamina. (Supply Item)

ezlifepowder.title: EZ Lifepowder
ezlifepowder.description: Produces a healing cloud around the area that heals anyone that comes in contact with it. (Supply Item)

ezmaxpotion.title: EZ Max Potion
ezmaxpotion.description: Fully restores health and maximizes your Health Gauge. (Supply Item)

ezlargebarrelbomb.title: EZ Large Barrel Bomb
ezlargebarrelbomb.description: A powered-up large barrel bomb. Just as powerful as a mega barrel bomb. (Supply Item)

ezshocktrap.title: EZ Shock Trap
ezshocktrap.description: Immobilizes a target for easy capture. (Supply Item)

ezpitfalltrap.title: EZ Pitfall Trap
ezpitfalltrap.description: Activates a pitfall to catch monsters with. (Supply Item)

ezherbalpowder.title: EZ Herbal Powder
ezherbalpowder.description: Cures poison and restores a bit of health for everyone nearby. (Supply Item)

ezdemonpowder.title: EZ Demon Powder
ezdemonpowder.description: Temporarily strengthens attacks for everyone nearby. (Supply Item)

ezhardshellpowder.title: EZ Hardshell Powder
ezhardshellpowder.description: Temporarily increases defense strength for everyone nearby. (Supply Item)

ezdungpod.title: EZ Dung Pod
ezdungpod.description: Releases a strong odor on impact. Causes certain monsters to flee. (Supply Item)

ezflashpod.title: EZ Flash Pod
ezflashpod.description: Slinger ammo that flashes brightly on impact. (Supply Item)

ezscreamerpod.title: EZ Screamer Pod
ezscreamerpod.description: Slinger ammo that emits an earsplitting sonic blast. (Supply Item)

throwingknife.title: Throwing Knife
throwingknife.description: A knife that can be shot from your slinger. Can be coated with a range of chemicals. (Supply Item)

poisonknife.title: Poison Knife
poisonknife.description: A knife coated with poison that can be shot from your slinger. (Supply Item)

sleepknife.title: Sleep Knife
sleepknife.description: A knife coated with a sedative that can be shot from your slinger. (Supply Item)

paralysisknife.title: Paralysis Knife
paralysisknife.description: A knife coated with a paralyzing toxin that can be shot from your slinger. (Supply Item)

tranqknife.title: Tranq Knife
tranqknife.description: A knife coated with a tranquilizer that can be shot from your slinger. (Supply Item)

ezfarcaster.title: EZ Farcaster
ezfarcaster.description: Call for a wingdrake to transport you to the nearest camp. (Supply Item)

eztranqbomb.title: EZ Tranq Bomb
eztranqbomb.description: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps. (Supply Item)

ballistaammo.title: Ballista Ammo
ballistaammo.description: Ammunition for the large Ballista. (Supply Item)

one-shotbinder.title: One-shot Binder
one-shotbinder.description: Ballista ammo that restrains targets. Disposable ammo, no cooldown. (Supply Item)

cannonammo.title: Cannon Ammo
cannonammo.description: Steel ammo made for hunting giant dragons. A real pain to lug around. (Supply Item)

ironore.title: Iron Ore
ironore.description: Ore that can be smelted into metal and used for many different purposes.

machaliteore.title: Machalite Ore
machaliteore.description: Ore that's more difficult to procure than Iron Ore. Produces fine metal.

dragoniteore.title: Dragonite Ore
dragoniteore.description: An ore that yields metal superior to that of Machalite. Invaluable for making durable armor.

carbaliteore.title: Carbalite Ore
carbaliteore.description: Ore obtained from mining outcrops. Still under research, but known to yield highly pure metal.

fuciumore.title: Fucium Ore
fuciumore.description: Ore obtained from the Elder's Recess. A mysterious metal, capable of fusing nearly any two materials together.

earthcrystal.title: Earth Crystal
earthcrystal.description: Crystallized microbes prized as an abrasive when forging weapons. Mainly found in the Wildspire Waste.

coralcrystal.title: Coral Crystal
coralcrystal.description: Crystal prized at the Smithy for use in high-grade abrasives. Mainly found in the Coral Highlands.

dragonveincrystal.title: Dragonvein Crystal
dragonveincrystal.description: Mined from high rank areas. Many expect this newly-discovered crystal to usher in a new era of metalwork.

lightcrystal.title: Lightcrystal
lightcrystal.description: A precious and extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

novacrystal.title: Novacrystal
novacrystal.description: High quality Lightcrystal. Highly coveted for its rarity, it's used for only the finest of metalworking.

firecellstone.title: Firecell Stone
firecellstone.description: A magma-like deposit that only trained hands can work with. Armor made from it is first-class.

aquacoreore.title: Aquacore Ore
aquacoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a vibrant glow that mirrors the ocean.

spiritcoreore.title: Spiritcore Ore
spiritcoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a warm, sunny glow.

dreamcoreore.title: Dreamcore Ore
dreamcoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a blazing glow reminiscent of a bonfire.

dragoncoreore.title: Dragoncore Ore
dragoncoreore.description: A valuable mineral used to create charms. Gives off a mysterious glow that grants the holder sagely wisdom.

armorsphere.title: Armor Sphere
armorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a tiny amount.

armorsphere+.title: Armor Sphere+
armorsphere+.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it by a small amount.

advancedarmorsphere.title: Advanced Armor Sphere
advancedarmorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to improve it.

hardarmorsphere.title: Hard Armor Sphere
hardarmorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to significantly improve it.

heavyarmorsphere.title: Heavy Armor Sphere
heavyarmorsphere.description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to greatly improve it.

sturdybone.title: Sturdy Bone
sturdybone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands and Rotten Vale.

qualitybone.title: Quality Bone
qualitybone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Its ease of use and hardness allow it to be shaped into better gear.

ancientbone.title: Ancient Bone
ancientbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Ancient Forest. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

boulderbone.title: Boulder Bone
boulderbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Wildspire Waste. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

coralbone.title: Coral Bone
coralbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Coral Highlands. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

warpedbone.title: Warped Bone
warpedbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Rotten Vale. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

brutalbone.title: Brutal Bone
brutalbone.description: A bone used as crafting material. Can be found in bonepiles in the Elder's Recess. Its size evokes a certain primal quality.

dragonbonerelic.title: Dragonbone Relic
dragonbonerelic.description: A high quality material found in bone piles. The only remains left of a species of dragon now lost to time.

unknownskull.title: Unknown Skull
unknownskull.description: A rare material found in bonepiles in the Elder's Recess. It appears to be some kind of animal skull.

greathornfly.title: Great Hornfly
greathornfly.description: Discovered by Botanical Research. An insect with a giant horn, massive shell, and butterfly-like wings.

sinistercloth.title: Sinister Cloth
sinistercloth.description: Suspect cloth the Tailraider Safari dug up from who-knows-where. Drips with an aura of pure evil.

monsterbones.title: Monster Bone S
monsterbones.description: A material found in bonepiles. Indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

monsterbonem.title: Monster Bone M
monsterbonem.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Strong yet flexible, it's as reliable as steel or wood.

monsterbonel.title: Monster Bone L
monsterbonel.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to work with due to its size, but vital when crafting larger items.

monsterbone+.title: Monster Bone+
monsterbone+.description: Bone obtained from large monsters. Hard to obtain, but vital for crafting powerful equipment.

monsterkeenbone.title: Monster Keenbone
monsterkeenbone.description: Bone obtained from high rank large monsters. It has a razor-sharp tip that retains its strength after forging.

monsterhardbone.title: Monster Hardbone
monsterhardbone.description: Precious bone obtained from high rank large monsters. Their rarity makes them highly sought after.

elderdragonbone.title: Elder Dragon Bone
elderdragonbone.description: A bone from an elder dragon. It exudes the great majesty of the beast that bore it.

sharpclaw.title: Sharp Claw
sharpclaw.description: Obtained from small fanged wyverns. Unlike wyvern claws, this is shaped to grip objects.

piercingclaw.title: Piercing Claw
piercingclaw.description: Material from high rank small fanged wyverns. Sharp enough that it might serve as a makeshift knife.

monsterfluid.title: Monster Fluid
monsterfluid.description: Material obtained from small insects. Mixes with insect gastric fluids to form adhesive.

monsterbroth.title: Monster Broth
monsterbroth.description: Material from high rank insects. A rich broth made from only the thickest of monster juices.

poisonsac.title: Poison Sac
poisonsac.description: A monster organ that contains a lethal toxin. Handle with extreme care.

toxinsac.title: Toxin Sac
toxinsac.description: A monster organ filled with an extremely potent toxin. Just touching it is dangerous.

paralysissac.title: Paralysis Sac
paralysissac.description: A monster organ that contains paralyzing neurotoxins.

omniplegiasac.title: Omniplegia Sac
omniplegiasac.description: A monster organ filled with potent neurotoxins. A single touch can cause paralysis.

sleepsac.title: Sleep Sac
sleepsac.description: A monster organ that contains a knockout powder capable of inducing sleep.

comasac.title: Coma Sac
comasac.description: A monster organ that contains dangerous powder. One whiff can induce a coma.

flamesac.title: Flame Sac
flamesac.description: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with extreme care.

infernosac.title: Inferno Sac
infernosac.description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

aquasac.title: Aqua Sac
aquasac.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve water.

torrentsac.title: Torrent Sac
torrentsac.description: A monster organ designed to hold and preserve copious amounts of water.

frostsac.title: Frost Sac
frostsac.description: A monster internal organ, filled with extremely low temperature fluid. Handle with care.

freezersac.title: Freezer Sac
freezersac.description: A monster organ with tremendous freezing power. Turns its surroundings to ice.

electrosac.title: Electro Sac
electrosac.description: A monster organ that can store up electricity, which is released on impact.

thundersac.title: Thunder Sac
thundersac.description: A monster organ that can store up large amounts of high voltage electricity.

birdwyverngem.title: Bird Wyvern Gem
birdwyverngem.description: A valuable gem that can be harvested from bird wyverns. Said to fetch a high price on the market.

wyverngem.title: Wyvern Gem
wyverngem.description: Throughout a wyvern's life, impurities gather and form this peculiar gem.

elderdragonblood.title: Elder Dragon Blood
elderdragonblood.description: Contains an unknown compound. The object of much scholarly research.

mosswinehide.title: Mosswine Hide
mosswinehide.description: A musty hide covered in moss.

warmpelt.title: Warm Pelt
warmpelt.description: A pelt from a small animal. Used for many things, but mostly just regular clothes.

high-qualitypelt.title: High-quality Pelt
high-qualitypelt.description: Rare pelt from a small animal. Feels wonderful to the touch and valued highly by the Commission.

silverwyverianprint.description: A ticket with a handprint, used by the First Wyverians. Exchange it for rare materials at the Melding Pot.

goldwyverianprint.title: Gold Wyverian Print
goldwyverianprint.description: A ticket with a handprint, used by the First Wyverians. Exchange it for very rare materials at the Melding Pot.

commendation.title: Commendation
commendation.description: A ticket awarded for demonstrating courage. Collect them and something wonderful may happen!

highcommendation.title: High Commendation
highcommendation.description: A ticket awarded for demonstrating tremendous courage. Collect them and something wonderful may happen!

researchcommissionticket.title: Research Commission Ticket
researchcommissionticket.description: A ticket issued by the commander to those who have aided the Research Commission. Show it to the Smithy!

pukeicoin.title: Pukei Coin
pukeicoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Pukei-Pukei in the Arena.

kulucoin.title: Kulu Coin
kulucoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Kulu-Ya-Ku in the Arena.

rathiancoin.title: Rathian Coin
rathiancoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Rathian in the Arena.

tzitzicoin.title: Tzitzi Coin
tzitzicoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Tzitzi-Ya-Ku in the Arena.

barrothcoin.title: Barroth Coin
barrothcoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Barroth in the Arena.

gamacoin.title: Gama Coin
gamacoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Dodogama in the Arena.

rathaloscoin.title: Rathalos Coin
rathaloscoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested a Rathalos in the Arena.

brutecoin.title: Brute Coin
brutecoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested multiple brute wyverns at the same time in the Arena.

flyingcoin.title: Flying Coin
flyingcoin.description: A coin given to those who have bested multiple flying wyverns at the same time in the Arena.

pinnaclecoin.title: Pinnacle Coin
pinnaclecoin.description: A commemorative coin bestowed on hunters who have mastered the craft. The value of its sheen? Priceless.

hunterkingcoin.title: Hunter King Coin
hunterkingcoin.description: A silver coin given to true hunters. It shines with all the glory of the Hunter King.

acehuntercoin.title: Ace Hunter Coin
acehuntercoin.description: A golden coin given to hunters at the pinnacle of their field. Only a small handful ever know such honor.

steelegg.title: Steel Egg
steelegg.description: An egg of glittering steel. Valuable and rare, but of no use to a hunter. (Trade-in Item)

silveregg.title: Silver Egg
silveregg.description: An egg of glittering silver. Valuable and rare, but of no use to a hunter. (Trade-in Item)

goldenegg.title: Golden Egg
goldenegg.description: An egg of glittering gold. Super valuable and rare, but of no use to a hunter. (Trade-in Item)

chippedscale.title: Chipped Scale
chippedscale.description: Acquired by using the Bandit Mantle. Chipped, but still prized by collectors. (Trade-in Item)

largescale.title: Large Scale
largescale.description: Acquired by using the Bandit Mantle. Consistently popular among collectors. (Trade-in Item)

beautifulscale.title: Beautiful Scale
beautifulscale.description: Acquired by using the Bandit Mantle. In perpetual demand among collectors. (Trade-in Item)

lustrousscale.title: Lustrous Scale
lustrousscale.description: Acquired by using the Bandit Mantle. A source of pride for any collector. (Trade-in Item)

glimmeringscale.title: Glimmering Scale
glimmeringscale.description: Acquired by using the Bandit Mantle. A must-have for any collector. (Trade-in Item)

bhernastone.title: Bhernastone
bhernastone.description: An Old World import. Beautiful, but not suitable for crafting. (Trade-in Item)

dundormarin.title: Dundormarin
dundormarin.description: An Old World import. Beautiful, but not suitable for crafting. (Trade-in Item)

loclacore.title: Loc Lac Ore
loclacore.description: An Old World import. Beautiful, but not suitable for crafting. (Trade-in Item)

valhabarquartz.title: Val Habar Quartz
valhabarquartz.description: An Old World import. Beautiful, but not suitable for crafting. (Trade-in Item)

minegardenite.title: Minegardenite
minegardenite.description: An Old World import. Beautiful, but not suitable for crafting. (Trade-in Item)

goldenscale.title: Golden Scale
goldenscale.description: The scales of a Goldenfish. They shimmer like only pure gold can. (Trade-in Item)

goldenscale+.title: Golden Scale+
goldenscale+.description: The scales of a Great Goldenfish. Trades at the same price as actual gold. (Trade-in Item)

platinumscale.title: Platinum Scale
platinumscale.description: The scales of a Platinumfish. They give off a beautiful gleam. (Trade-in Item)

platinumscale+.title: Platinum Scale+
platinumscale+.description: The scales of a Great Platinumfish. Their shine is nigh on blinding. (Trade-in Item)

gildedscale.title: Gilded Scale
gildedscale.description: The scales of a Goldenfry. Used by artisans in their crafts. (Trade-in Item)

gildedscale+.title: Gilded Scale+
gildedscale+.description: The scales of a Great Goldenfry. Used in the very finest of crafts. (Trade-in Item)

whiteliver.title: White Liver
whiteliver.description: A white-colored liver, popular for its juicy texture. (Account Item)

wyverntear.title: Wyvern Tear
wyverntear.description: Bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

largewyverntear.title: Large Wyvern Tear
largewyverntear.description: Large, bitter tears wept by wyverns on certain occasions. (Account Item)

dragontreasure.title: Dragon Treasure
dragontreasure.description: A shiny rock that elder dragons like to collect. (Account Item)

sunbloom.title: Sunbloom
sunbloom.description: A flower from the Ancient Forest. It's been bathed in the warmth of the sun. (Account Item)

shinebloom.title: Shinebloom
shinebloom.description: A rare flower from the Ancient Forest. Has a scent of sunlight on its petals. (Account Item)

goldbloom.title: Goldbloom
goldbloom.description: A precious flower from the Ancient Forest. It glitters brighter than gold. (Account Item)

gourmetshroomcap.title: Gourmet Shroomcap
gourmetshroomcap.description: A mushroom from the Ancient Forest. Known for its unique tenderness. (Account Item)

exquisiteshroomcap.title: Exquisite Shroomcap
exquisiteshroomcap.description: A rare mushroom from the Ancient Forest. Highly sought after by elite chefs. (Account Item)

spiritshroomcap.title: Spirit Shroomcap
spiritshroomcap.description: A precious mushroom from the Ancient Forest. Possesses a fantastical glow. (Account Item)

baublecactus.title: Bauble Cactus
baublecactus.description: A cactus from the Wildspire Waste. Small but fleshy. (Account Item)

jewelcactus.title: Jewel Cactus
jewelcactus.description: A rare cactus from the Wildspire Waste. Big and meaty. (Account Item)

kinglycactus.title: Kingly Cactus
kinglycactus.description: A precious cactus from the Wildspire Waste. The undeniable prickle king. (Account Item)

hardfruit.title: Hardfruit
hardfruit.description: Fruit from the Wildspire Waste. Hard on the outside, juicy on the inside. (Account Item)

rockfruit.title: Rockfruit
rockfruit.description: Rare fruit from the Wildspire Waste. Tasty, but brutal on the chompers. (Account Item)

wildfruit.title: Wildfruit
wildfruit.description: Precious fruit from the Wildspire Waste. Not for the faint of heart. (Account Item)

superabalone.title: Super Abalone
superabalone.description: Coral Highlands seafood. A rare delicacy. (Account Item)

choiceabalone.title: Choice Abalone
choiceabalone.description: Rare Coral Highlands seafood. Big in size, big in flavor. (Account Item)

preciousabalone.title: Precious Abalone
preciousabalone.description: Precious Coral Highlands seafood. A delicacy among delicacies. (Account Item)

lightpearl.title: Light Pearl
lightpearl.description: A jewel from the Coral Highlands. Gleams brilliantly. (Account Item)

deeppearl.title: Deep Pearl
deeppearl.description: A rare jewel from the Coral Highlands. Glows with a profound luster. (Account Item)

innocentpearl.title: Innocent Pearl
innocentpearl.description: A precious jewel from the Coral Highlands. Glistens with purity. (Account Item)

forgottenfossil.title: Forgotten Fossil
forgottenfossil.description: A fossil from the Rotten Vale. It bears tracks from antiquity. (Account Item)

legendaryfossil.title: Legendary Fossil
legendaryfossil.description: A rare fossil from the Rotten Vale. The life it holds is long extinct. (Account Item)

mysticalfossil.title: Mystical Fossil
mysticalfossil.description: A precious fossil from the Rotten Vale. The key to an ancient mystery. (Account Item)

undergroundfruit.title: Underground Fruit
undergroundfruit.description: Fruit from the Rotten Vale. It grows to maturity without sun. (Account Item)

taintedfruit.title: Tainted Fruit
taintedfruit.description: Rare fruit from the Rotten Vale. It thrives under arduous conditions. (Account Item)

elysianfruit.title: Elysian Fruit
elysianfruit.description: Precious fruit from the Rotten Vale. Its aroma is not of this world. (Account Item)

gaiaamber.title: Gaia Amber
gaiaamber.description: Amber from the Elder's Recess. A golden tear plucked from the earth. (Account Item)

dragonveinamber.title: Dragonvein Amber
dragonveinamber.description: Rare amber from the Elder's Recess. It pulses with nature's raw energy. (Account Item)

ancientamber.title: Ancient Amber
ancientamber.description: Precious amber from the Elder's Recess. A piece of antiquity. (Account Item)

blueberyl.title: Blue Beryl
blueberyl.description: A gem from the Elder's Recess. It shines with the color of the waves. (Account Item)

trueberyl.title: True Beryl
trueberyl.description: A rare gem from the Elder's Recess. It glints with the clarity of truth. (Account Item)

abyssalberyl.title: Abyssal Beryl
abyssalberyl.description: A precious gem from the Elder's Recess. Has a deep, hypnotic hue. (Account Item)

sunkissedgrass.title: Sunkissed Grass
sunkissedgrass.description: A special plant from the Ancient Forest. Known to cure all types of diseases. (Account Item)

moonlitmushroom.title: Moonlit Mushroom
moonlitmushroom.description: A special plant from the Ancient Forest. Radiates like the full moon. (Account Item)

dragonbloom.title: Dragonbloom
dragonbloom.description: A special flower from the Wildspire Waste. Hard as dragon scale. (Account Item)

divineapple.title: Divineapple
divineapple.description: Special fruit from the Wildspire Waste. Quite difficult to cultivate. (Account Item)

violetabalone.title: Violet Abalone
violetabalone.description: Special seafood from the Coral Highlands. Unique in both taste and aroma. (Account Item)

platinumpearl.title: Platinum Pearl
platinumpearl.description: A special jewel from the Coral Highlands. Bears a metallic sheen. (Account Item)

wickedfossil.title: Wicked Fossil
wickedfossil.description: A special fossil from the Rotten Vale. Unspeakably ominous. (Account Item)

heavenberry.title: Heavenberry
heavenberry.description: Special fruit from the Rotten Vale. One bite'll send you to the pearly gates. (Account Item)

twilightstone.title: Twilight Stone
twilightstone.description: A special gem from the Elder's Recess. The color of a sinking sun. (Account Item)

noahstone.title: Noahstone
noahstone.description: A special gem from the Elder's Recess. Its brilliance engulfs all. (Account Item)

wyvernegg.title: Wyvern Egg
wyvernegg.description: A flying wyvern's egg. Deliver it back to camp...if you can. (Account Item)

herbivoreegg.title: Herbivore Egg
herbivoreegg.description: An herbivore egg. Deliver it back to camp...if you can. (Account Item)

lumpofmeat.title: Lump of Meat
lumpofmeat.description: A lump of meat left by an Odogaron. Its distinct odor lures carnivores. (Account Item)

shepherdhare.title: Shepherd Hare
shepherdhare.description: An animal often seen scurrying down narrow side paths. Follow one and you might discover a new shortcut.

pilothare.title: Pilot Hare
pilothare.description: A rare animal that appears on sunny days. They've been said to guide travelers who have lost their way.

woodlandpteryx.title: Woodland Pteryx
woodlandpteryx.description: A bird common to forested areas. Its bones and feathers resemble those of a prehistoric creature.

forestpteryx.title: Forest Pteryx
forestpteryx.description: A rare bird. Though it resembles fossilized species, it also has unprecedented physical features.

cobaltflutterfly.title: Cobalt Flutterfly
cobaltflutterfly.description: A beautiful, vibrant butterfly with cobalt-blue wings.

phantomflutterfly.title: Phantom Flutterfly
phantomflutterfly.description: A brightly-colored, incredibly rare butterfly. The few sightings reported of it have all been on sunny days.

climbingjoyperch.title: Climbing Joyperch
climbingjoyperch.description: An amphibian that has retained many of its ancient characteristics. Their songs can be heard during rainfall.

forestgekko.title: Forest Gekko
forestgekko.description: An arboreal lizard often found near brightmoss, predating on the insects that are drawn to the light.

wildspiregekko.title: Wildspire Gekko
wildspiregekko.description: A lizard found near ant hills. Exceptionally large ant hills can draw surprisingly large numbers.

gloomgekko.title: Gloom Gekko
gloomgekko.description: A lizard found in caves and other dark places. Their coloration serves as a warning to ward off predators.

moonlightgekko.title: Moonlight Gekko
moonlightgekko.description: A rare lizard whose brightmoss diet causes its tail to glow, a trait it uses to lure in prey.

vaporonid.title: Vaporonid
vaporonid.description: An Ancient Forest spider that spins webs larger in size than humans.

scavantula.title: Scavantula
scavantula.description: A ground-dwelling spider whose chief diet is rotting flesh. Often found living in groups near bonepiles.

revolture.title: Revolture
revolture.description: A carrion-eating bird that scavenges meat from carcasses. It is often spotted flying above large monsters.

blissbill.title: Blissbill
blissbill.description: An herbivorous bird that feeds on fruits and seeds. Comfortable around humans and common near Astera.

omenfly.title: Omenfly
omenfly.description: Insects that emit light from their tails. They usually glow white, but will glow red when in danger.

augurfly.title: Augurfly
augurfly.description: A strange, rare insect that appears during foul weather. They only enter their adult stage during rainfall.

scalebat.title: Scalebat
scalebat.description: A flying wyvern that evolved to adapt to life in caves, taking on a much smaller, bat-like appearance.

dungbeetle.title: Dung Beetle
dungbeetle.description: A beetle known to roll balls of monster dung. This process hardens the dung into fine Slinger ammo.

bombbeetle.title: Bomb Beetle
bombbeetle.description: A beetle known to roll large stones. Gathering from those stones often yields Slinger bomb pods.

pinkparexus.title: Pink Parexus
pinkparexus.description: A fish whose physiology remains almost unchanged from its ancient ancestors. Its spiny fins help ward off predators.

greatpinkparexus.title: Great Pink Parexus
greatpinkparexus.description: A jumbo-sized Pink Parexus. It must have lived for countless years to reach this size.

burstarowana.title: Burst Arowana
burstarowana.description: Fish that smell of gunpowder. Use their scales and fire herbs to craft large amounts of gunpowder.

bombarowana.title: Bomb Arowana
bombarowana.description: Fish that smell of gunpowder. Use their scales and fire herbs to craft large amounts of quality gunpowder.

greatburstarowana.title: Great Burst Arowana
greatburstarowana.description: A jumbo-sized Burst Arowana. Greater in size and volatility. Handle with extreme care.

greatbombarowana.title: Great Bomb Arowana
greatbombarowana.description: A jumbo-sized Bomb Arowana. Greater in size and volatility. Handle with extreme care.

elegantcoralbird.title: Elegant Coralbird
elegantcoralbird.description: The common name for a female Coralbird. Their vibrant pink color is a result of their coral diet.

dappercoralbird.title: Dapper Coralbird
dappercoralbird.description: The common name for a Coralbird male. Extremely rare, as they only appear for mating.

andangler.title: Andangler
andangler.description: A fish bearing a luminous protrusion on its head, which it uses to lure Flying Meduso, its primary prey.

downycrake.title: Downy Crake
downycrake.description: A legendarily rare bird, covered in decadently soft down. It travels atop the back of its symbiotic host.

bristlycrake.title: Bristly Crake
bristlycrake.description: A legendarily rare bird, covered in bizarrely stiff, bristly down. It travels atop the back of its symbiotic host.

hopguppy.title: Hopguppy
hopguppy.description: A fish that bounces across the surface of the water, spreading its pectoral fins to glide farther.

petricanths.title: Petricanths
petricanths.description: Previously known via fossils, this species was thought extinct. Finding otherwise was a real surprise.

paratoad.title: Paratoad
paratoad.description: A toad that releases paralyzing gas on impact. Its effect is potent enough to paralyze even large monsters.

sleeptoad.title: Sleeptoad
sleeptoad.description: A toad that releases sleeping gas on impact. Its effect is potent enough to put down even large monsters.

nitrotoad.title: Nitrotoad
nitrotoad.description: A toad that secretes an explosive gel on impact. The blast is strong enough to stagger even large monsters.

wiggler.title: Wiggler
wiggler.description: A creature from the Coral Highlands. Match its eye level to put it at ease, allowing you to approach it.

wigglerqueen.title: Wiggler Queen
wigglerqueen.description: A rare creature that appears only on moonlit nights. Watching it dance on the breeze is a truly magical sight.

vigorwasp.title: Vigorwasp
vigorwasp.description: An insect that collects restorative nectar in its body, releasing it in a cloud when struck.

giantvigorwasp.title: Giant Vigorwasp
giantvigorwasp.description: An insect that stores a highly concentrated nectar which leaves a restorative cloud when released.

flyingmeduso.title: Flying Meduso
flyingmeduso.description: A native to the Coral Highlands that moves by riding the wind. Found in areas with the strongest breezes.

carrierant.title: Carrier Ant
carrierant.description: Ants that are known to carry about all sorts of items, including, rarely, large monster materials.

hercudrome.title: Hercudrome
hercudrome.description: A large beetle with impressive horns. Hercudromes only inhabit seven specific spots in the Ancient Forest.

goldhercudrome.title: Gold Hercudrome
goldhercudrome.description: A glistening golden beetle, thought to bring good fortune. It only appears at night.

prismhercudrome.title: Prism Hercudrome
prismhercudrome.description: A shiny, rainbow-colored beetle. Due to its crepuscular nature, it is only usually seen at dawn and dusk.

emperorhopper.title: Emperor Hopper
emperorhopper.description: A grasshopper as big as its moniker would suggest. Its swift, frenetic jumps make it hard to capture.

tyranthopper.title: Tyrant Hopper
tyranthopper.description: This previously docile, herbivorous insect underwent phase variation to become a vicious carrion-eater.

flashfly.title: Flashfly
flashfly.description: An insect that emits a bright flash when struck, which is brighter when in a swarm. The flash blinds monsters.

grandfathermantagrell.title: Grandfather Mantagrell
grandfathermantagrell.description: A creature that rides air currents to float in midair. Weak to impacts, one good blow will bring it down.

ironhelmcrab.title: Iron Helmcrab
ironhelmcrab.description: A crustacean found in muddy terrain. It frequently carries hard objects, and occasionally drops piercing pods.

soldierhelmcrab.title: Soldier Helmcrab
soldierhelmcrab.description: A crustacean native to the Rotten Vale. They travel in large packs, stripping meat from carcasses.

emeraldhelmcrab.title: Emerald Helmcrab
emeraldhelmcrab.description: A beautiful crustacean usually seen during inclement weather. It's said to be rarer than its gem namesake.

whetfish.title: Whetfish
whetfish.description: A fish with a dorsal fin hard enough to be used to sharpen weapons.

greatwhetfish.title: Great Whetfish
greatwhetfish.description: A jumbo-sized Whetfish. Its dorsal fin surpasses even whetstones in its sharpness.

gastronometuna.title: Gastronome Tuna
gastronometuna.description: A fish that eats anything� allowing you to sometimes get items from its stomach.

greatgastronometuna.title: Great Gastronome Tuna
greatgastronometuna.description: A jumbo-sized Gastronome Tuna. Its ravenous diet has ballooned it into the king of gluttons.

kingmarlin.title: King Marlin
kingmarlin.description: A fish with a jaw shaped like a sword. Inhabits warm waters, and cannot be seen during cold nights.

greatkingmarlin.title: Great King Marlin
greatkingmarlin.description: A jumbo-sized King Marlin. Its overwhelming size makes it seem like a different species entirely.

goldenfish.title: Goldenfish
goldenfish.description: A rare fish that glitters as if it was actual gold. Its scales can fetch the same price as gold, too!

platinumfish.title: Platinumfish
platinumfish.description: A rare fish that shines like platinum, with glimmering scales just as valuable.

greatgoldenfish.title: Great Goldenfish
greatgoldenfish.description: A jumbo-sized Goldenfish. Not only is it bigger, its color and luster rival the finest craftsman's art.

greatplatinumfish.title: Great Platinumfish
greatplatinumfish.description: A jumbo-sized Platinumfish. Not only is it bigger, its color and luster rival the finest craftsman's art.

goldenfry.title: Goldenfry
goldenfry.description: A small, rare fish that glitters like gold, and whose beautiful scales sell for just as much.

greatgoldenfry.title: Great Goldenfry
greatgoldenfry.description: A jumbo-sized Goldenfry. Not only is it bigger, its color and luster rival the finest craftsman's art.

sushifish.title: Sushifish
sushifish.description: A fatty fish popular among hunters. Its scales are rich in nutrients and can restore health.

greatsushifish.title: Great Sushifish
greatsushifish.description: A jumbo-sized Sushifish. Generously plump from its bountiful supply of food.

gunpowderfish.title: Gunpowderfish
gunpowderfish.description: A fish that smells of gunpowder. Its unique scales can be used as explosive powder.

greatgunpowderfish.title: Great Gunpowderfish
greatgunpowderfish.description: A jumbo-sized Gunpowderfish. Greater in size and volatility. Handle with extreme care.

antidotejewel1.title: Antidote Jewel 1
antidotejewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Poison Resistance skill.

antiparajewel1.title: Antipara Jewel 1
antiparajewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Paralysis Resistance skill.

pepjewel1.title: Pep Jewel 1
pepjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Sleep Resistance skill.

steadfastjewel1.title: Steadfast Jewel 1
steadfastjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Stun Resistance skill.

antiblastjewel1.title: Antiblast Jewel 1
antiblastjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Blast Resistance skill.

suturejewel1.title: Suture Jewel 1
suturejewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Bleeding Resistance skill.

deflockjewel1.title: Def Lock Jewel 1
deflockjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Iron Skin skill.

earplugjewel3.title: Earplug Jewel 3
earplugjewel3.description: A decoration that enhances the Earplugs skill.

windresistjewel2.title: Wind Resist Jewel 2
windresistjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Windproof skill.

footingjewel2.title: Footing Jewel 2
footingjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Tremor Resistance skill.

attackjewel1.title: Attack Jewel 1
attackjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Attack Boost skill.

defensejewel1.title: Defense Jewel 1
defensejewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Defense Boost skill.

vitalityjewel1.title: Vitality Jewel 1
vitalityjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Health Boost skill.

recoveryjewel1.title: Recovery Jewel 1
recoveryjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Recovery Speed skill.

fireresjewel1.title: Fire Res Jewel 1
fireresjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Fire Resistance skill.

waterresjewel1.title: Water Res Jewel 1
waterresjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Water Resistance skill.

iceresjewel1.title: Ice Res Jewel 1
iceresjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Ice Resistance skill.

thunderresjewel1.title: Thunder Res Jewel 1
thunderresjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Thunder Resistance skill.

dragonresjewel1.title: Dragon Res Jewel 1
dragonresjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Dragon Resistance skill.

resistorjewel1.title: Resistor Jewel 1
resistorjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Blight Resistance skill.

blazejewel1.title: Blaze Jewel 1
blazejewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Fire Attack skill.

streamjewel1.title: Stream Jewel 1
streamjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Water Attack skill.

frostjewel1.title: Frost Jewel 1
frostjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Ice Attack skill.

boltjewel1.title: Bolt Jewel 1
boltjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Thunder Attack skill.

dragonjewel1.title: Dragon Jewel 1
dragonjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Dragon Attack skill.

venomjewel1.title: Venom Jewel 1
venomjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Poison Attack skill.

paralyzerjewel1.title: Paralyzer Jewel 1
paralyzerjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Paralysis Attack skill.

sleepjewel1.title: Sleep Jewel 1
sleepjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Sleep Attack skill.

blastjewel1.title: Blast Jewel 1
blastjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Blast Attack skill.

poisoncoatjewel3.title: Poisoncoat Jewel 3
poisoncoatjewel3.description: A decoration that enhances the Poison Functionality skill.

paracoatjewel3.title: Paracoat Jewel 3
paracoatjewel3.description: A decoration that enhances the Para Functionality skill.

sleepcoatjewel3.title: Sleepcoat Jewel 3
sleepcoatjewel3.description: A decoration that enhances the Sleep Functionality skill.

blastcoatjewel3.title: Blastcoat Jewel 3
blastcoatjewel3.description: A decoration that enhances the Blast Functionality skill.

releasejewel3.title: Release Jewel 3
releasejewel3.description: A decoration that enhances the Free Element/Ammo Up skill.

expertjewel1.title: Expert Jewel 1
expertjewel1.description: A decoration that enhances the Critical Eye skill.

criticaljewel2.title: Critical Jewel 2
criticaljewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Critical Boost skill.

tenderizerjewel2.title: Tenderizer Jewel 2
tenderizerjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Weakness Exploit skill.

chargerjewel2.title: Charger Jewel 2
chargerjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Focus skill.

handicraftjewel3.title: Handicraft Jewel 3
handicraftjewel3.description: A decoration that enhances the Handicraft skill.

drawjewel2.title: Draw Jewel 2
drawjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Critical Draw skill.

destroyerjewel2.title: Destroyer Jewel 2
destroyerjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Partbreaker skill.

stone.title: Stone
stone.description: Slinger ammo that can be used to hit faraway plant life and bombs.

redpit.title: Redpit
redpit.description: Slinger ammo that can be used to hit faraway plant life and bombs.

brightmoss.title: Brightmoss
brightmoss.description: Slinger ammo that illuminates an area upon impact. Can also blind flying wyverns.

scatternut.title: Scatternut
scatternut.description: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact. Use it to stagger a monster when you're in a pinch.

torchpod.title: Torch Pod
torchpod.description: Slinger ammo that can be used to scare away small monsters or to illuminate dark areas.

bombpod.title: Bomb Pod
bombpod.description: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact.

thornpod.title: Thorn Pod
thornpod.description: Slinger ammo with a thorny husk that sticks to monster hide. Attack it to produce a shock.

piercingpod.title: Piercing Pod
piercingpod.description: Slinger ammo that deals piercing damage on impact.

dragonpod.title: Dragon Pod
dragonpod.description: Slinger ammo that deals dragon element damage.

crystalburst.title: Crystalburst
crystalburst.description: Slinger ammo that explodes on impact. Use it to stagger a monster when you're in a pinch.

puddlepod.title: Puddle Pod
puddlepod.description: Slinger ammo imbued with the water element. It can also wash monsters clean of stuck-on mud.

chillshroom.title: Chillshroom
chillshroom.description: This mushroom is a primary ingredient in cool drinks.

tailraidervoucher.title: Tailraider Voucher
tailraidervoucher.description: Proof of friendship with the Lynians of the new continent. Show it to the Smithy and see what happens!

emeraldshell.title: Emerald Shell
emeraldshell.description: An emerald Helmcrab carapace, every bit as lovely as its gem namesake. (Trade-in Item)

gajalakasketch.title: Gajalaka Sketch
gajalakasketch.description: Proof of friendship with the Gajalaka tribes of the new continent. Show it to the Smithy and see what happens!

mightybowjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Bow Charge Plus skill.
