elementlessjewel2.description: A decoration that enhances the Non-elemental Boost skill.

deviljhoscale.title: Deviljho Scale
deviljhoscale.description: Rare Deviljho material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

deviljhohide.title: Deviljho Hide
deviljhohide.description: Rare Deviljho material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Supple, used to craft gear.

deviljhotallfang.title: Deviljho Tallfang
deviljhotallfang.description: Rare Deviljho material. Obtained by breaking its head. Stout, used in many weapons.

deviljhotalon.title: Deviljho Talon
deviljhotalon.description: Rare Deviljho material. Mostly obtained by carving. Compatible with dragon element.

deviljhoscalp.title: Deviljho Scalp
deviljhoscalp.description: Rare Deviljho material. Obtained by breaking its head. Unusual, used in select gear.

deviljhotail.title: Deviljho Tail
deviljhotail.description: Rare Deviljho material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

deviljhosaliva.title: Deviljho Saliva
deviljhosaliva.description: Rare Deviljho material. Obtained by collecting rare drops. Unusual and difficult to handle.

deviljhogem.title: Deviljho Gem
deviljhogem.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Deviljho tissue. Used to dramatically improve gear.

kulvetarothgoldenscale.title: Kulve Taroth Golden Scale
kulvetarothgoldenscale.description: Rare Kulve Taroth material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Many have fallen trying to obtain just one of these.

kulvetarothgoldenshell.title: Kulve Taroth Golden Shell
kulvetarothgoldenshell.description: Rare Kulve Taroth material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Its value is tied to its brilliant gold shine.

kulvetarothgoldennugget.title: Kulve Taroth Golden Nugget
kulvetarothgoldennugget.description: Rare Kulve Taroth material. Obtained by collecting rare drops. Emits an exotic light towards those that look at it.

kulvetarothgoldenspiralhorn.title: Kulve Taroth Golden Spiralhorn
kulvetarothgoldenspiralhorn.description: Rare Kulve Taroth material. Obtained by breaking its head. It defiantly glows despite its age and weight.

kulvetarothgoldentailshell.title: Kulve Taroth Golden Tailshell
kulvetarothgoldentailshell.description: Rare Kulve Taroth material. Obtained by breaking its tail. It shimmers a lustrous gold.

kulvetarothgoldenglimstone.title: Kulve Taroth Golden Glimstone
kulvetarothgoldenglimstone.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Kulve Taroth tissue. Within it lies unimaginable power.

goldenfragment.title: Golden Fragment
goldenfragment.description: A fragment of pure gold. It fetches a high price despite its size. (Trade-in Item)

goldenchunk.title: Golden Chunk
goldenchunk.description: A precious lump of gold. Its brilliance can bewitch the purest of hearts. (Trade-in Item)

lunastrascale+.title: Lunastra Scale+
lunastrascale+.description: Rare Lunastra material. Mostly obtained by carving. Broadly used for many purposes.

lunastrawing.title: Lunastra Wing
lunastrawing.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by breaking its wings. Supple, used to craft gear.

lunastragem.title: Lunastra Gem
lunastragem.description: A rare gem said to have formed within Lunastra tissue. Within it lies unimaginable power.

lunastracarapace.title: Lunastra Carapace
lunastracarapace.description: Rare Lunastra material. Mostly obtained as a reward. Solid, used to craft gear.

lunastramane.title: Lunastra Mane
lunastramane.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by collecting rare drops. Valuable, fire resistant material.

lunastratail.title: Lunastra Tail
lunastratail.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by carving its severed tail. Stiff, used to craft gear.

lunastrahorn.title: Lunastra Horn
lunastrahorn.description: Rare Lunastra material. Obtained by breaking its head. Stout, used in many weapons.

behemothmane.title: Behemoth Mane
behemothmane.description: Rare Behemoth material. Tinged with magical power that can summon meteors from the heavens.

behemothbone.title: Behemoth Bone
behemothbone.description: Rare Behemoth material. Bone so absurdly strong that it can even knock out legendary heroes.

behemothgreathorn.title: Behemoth Great Horn
behemothgreathorn.description: Rare Behemoth material. The ominous light that this horn emits leaves even the Warriors of Light shaken.

behemothshearclaw.title: Behemoth Shearclaw
behemothshearclaw.description: Rare Behemoth material. These claws cut down weaker prey in a single blow.

behemothtail.title: Behemoth Tail
behemothtail.description: Rare Behemoth material. A thick, muscular tail that sweeps away all threats.

aetheryteshard.title: Aetheryte Shard
aetheryteshard.description: A fragment of a glittering crystal. Contains an unknown, otherworldly energy called "aether."

springblossomticket.title: Spring Blossom Ticket
springblossomticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Spring Blossom Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

summertwilightticket.title: Summer Twilight Ticket
summertwilightticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Summer Twilight Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

autumnharvestticket.title: Autumn Harvest Ticket
autumnharvestticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Autumn Harvest Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

winterstarticket.title: Winter Star Ticket
winterstarticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Winter Star Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

appreciationticket.title: Appreciation Ticket
appreciationticket.description: A ticket you receive for attending the Appreciation Fest. Can be exchanged for special equipment or fireworks.

springinsectfieldguide.title: Spring Insect Field Guide
springinsectfieldguide.description: A field guide containing must-know info about Great Hornflies. Show it to the Smithy for a...novel armor set.

summerinsectfieldguide.title: Summer Insect Field Guide
summerinsectfieldguide.description: A field guide containing new info about Great Hornflies. Show it to the smithy for a...novel armor set.

vaalhazakticket.title: Vaal Hazak Ticket
vaalhazakticket.description: A ticket bearing Vaal Hazak, engulfed in eternal darkness. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

kirinticket.title: Kirin Ticket
kirinticket.description: A ticket bearing Kirin, caressed by lightning. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

teostraticket.title: Teostra Ticket
teostraticket.description: A ticket bearing Teostra, ruling over purgatory. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

kushaladaoraticket.title: Kushala Daora Ticket
kushaladaoraticket.description: A ticket bearing Kushala Daora, commanding the winds. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

nergiganteticket.title: Nergigante Ticket
nergiganteticket.description: A ticket bearing Nergigante, utter destruction incarnate. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

zorahmagdarosticket.title: Zorah Magdaros Ticket
zorahmagdarosticket.description: A ticket bearing Zorah, trampling over the New World. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

xeno'jiivaticket.title: Xeno'jiiva Ticket
xeno'jiivaticket.description: A ticket bearing Xeno'jiiva, elder dragon transcended. Redeem at the Smithy to make novel equipment.

blackbandage.title: Black Bandage
blackbandage.description: Cloth made from the glossy black hide of a monster. Not obtainable by normal means.

blackcrystalticket.title: Black Crystal Ticket
blackcrystalticket.description: A ticket you can trade for a crystal that emits a darkness-sucking light. Not obtainable by normal means.

kulu-ya-kuticket.title: Kulu-Ya-Ku Ticket
kulu-ya-kuticket.description: A ticket given to those who help with Kulu-Ya-Ku research. Includes a very accurate sketch.

wigglerticket.title: Wiggler Ticket
wigglerticket.description: A ticket given to those who help with Wiggler research. Comes with a rough sketch from a researcher.

megamanticket.title: Mega Man Ticket
megamanticket.description: A ticket for a special Mega Man tie-in. Gives you access to special 8-bit retro Palico equipment.

azurestarshard.title: Azure Star Shard
azurestarshard.description: Special material given to those who complete USJ's challenge. Glows a beautiful, transparent blue.

azurestargem.title: Azure Stargem
azurestargem.description: Special material for those who overcome the USJ challenge. Shines a miraculous blue.

redorb.title: Red Orb
redorb.description: Blood of demonic beings condensed into stone. Can be used to craft stylish devil hunter equipment.

mastercraftsman'sblueprint.title: Master Craftsman's Blueprint
mastercraftsman'sblueprint.description: A blueprint for a revolutionary Great Sword, designed by a famed craftsman.

dissolvedweapon.title: Dissolved Weapon
dissolvedweapon.description: A weapon carved from Kulve Taroth. Must be repaired before it can be used. (Appraised after investigation)

meldedweapon.title: Melded Weapon
meldedweapon.description: A weapon carved from Kulve Taroth. Some parts have been infused with gold. (Appraised after investigation)

sublimatedweapon.title: Sublimated Weapon
sublimatedweapon.description: A weapon carved from Kulve Taroth Strengthened by being infused with gold. (Appraised after investigation)

bushiticket.title: Bushi Ticket
bushiticket.description: A voucher given to those who assisted in the special investigation. Be sure to show it to the Resource Center!

blossomfireworks.title: Blossom Fireworks
blossomfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Spring Blossom Fest. Light up the sky and enjoy the festivities!

twilightfireworks.title: Twilight Fireworks
twilightfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Summer Twilight Fest. Enjoy the summer heat with a bang!

harvestfireworks.title: Harvest Fireworks
harvestfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Autumn Harvest Fest. Dance till the ground lights up in a blaze!

starfireworks.title: Star Fireworks
starfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Winter Star Fest. Enjoy the festivities with a bang!

appreciationfireworks.title: Appreciation Fireworks
appreciationfireworks.description: Fireworks you receive for attending the Appreciation Fest. Show your thanks by lighting these fireworks!

goldscalebat.title: Gold Scalebat
goldscalebat.description: A relative of the Scalebat, this nocturnal hunter developed a shiny coat as a result of inhabiting the golden underground.

goldhelmcrab.title: Gold Helmcrab
goldhelmcrab.description: A creature that hoards Dragon Pods. It has gained the attention of those studying the flow of the Everstream.

shinygoldhelmcrab.title: Shiny Gold Helmcrab
shinygoldhelmcrab.description: A creature that has hoarded a vast amount of Dragon Pods. The key to the Kulve Taroth mystery?

coppercalappa.title: Copper Calappa
coppercalappa.description: A creature that feeds on gold frag- ments dropped by Taroth. Its shell becomes more golden by the year.

goldcalappa.title: Gold Calappa
goldcalappa.description: A Calappa whose shine matches its old age. These creatures are often called living gold nuggets.

tsuchinoko.title: Tsuchinoko
tsuchinoko.description: A creature that exists only in eye- witness reports. To catch one is to become rich beyond imagination.

cactuarcutting.title: Cactuar Cutting
cactuarcutting.description: A mysterious creature from Eorzea that looks like a cactus but is not. Very fast when it needs to escape.

goldchipfragment.title: Gold Chip Fragment
goldchipfragment.description: A fragment that a Copper Calappa harvested from a Kulve Taroth track. (Trade-in Item)

goldnuggetfragment.title: Gold Nugget Fragment
goldnuggetfragment.description: A fragment that can only be harvested from a very heavy Taroth track. (Trade-in Item)

blossomticket.title: Blossom Ticket
blossomticket.description: A ticket with the Spring Blossom Fest drawn in all its splendor. Be sure to show it to the Resource Center!

senu'sfeather.title: Senu's Feather
senu'sfeather.description: A feather from Senu, loyal to an assassin who stands against injustice and oppression. Show it to the Smithy.

ignisign.title: Igni Sign
ignisign.description: A type of magic used by witchers. Sprays fire at enemies in front of you.

hunterrunestone.title: Hunter Runestone
hunterrunestone.description: To the Hunter of Astera. An otherworldly stone gifted by Geralt. Depicts a magic sign for controlling fire.

nekker.title: Nekker
nekker.description: A creature from another world. A lone nekker is harmless, but five are dangerous... Or so they say.

brigadeticket.title: Brigade Ticket
brigadeticket.description: A ticket with Astera drawn in all its splendor. Be sure to show it to the Resource Center!

guildcrossticket.title: Guild Cross Ticket
guildcrossticket.description: A ticket with Astera's induction ceremony drawn on it. Be sure to show it to the Resource Center!

downycraketicket.title: Downy Crake Ticket
downycraketicket.description: A ticket with a pair of Downy Crakes drawn on it. Redeem at the Smithy for something nice!?

bristlycraketicket.title: Bristly Crake Ticket
bristlycraketicket.description: A ticket with a large Bristly Crake drawn on it. Redeem at the Smithy for something nice!?

firstfleetticket.title: First Fleet Ticket
firstfleetticket.description: A ticket with the First Fleet's flag and emblem. Redeem at the Smithy for something nice!?

fifthfleetticket.title: Fifth Fleet Ticket
fifthfleetticket.description: A ticket with the Fifth Fleet's flag and emblem. Redeem at the Smithy for something nice!?

lunastraticket.title: Lunastra Ticket
lunastraticket.description: A ticket with Lunastra and Teostra, roaring in unison. Redeem at the Smithy for special equipment.

transparentstone.title: Transparent Stone
transparentstone.description: A mysterious stone filled with an odd, transparent radiance. (Account Item)

floweringcactuarcutting.title: Flowering Cactuar Cutting
floweringcactuarcutting.description: A mysterious creature from Eorzea that looks like a cactus but is not. Sprouts only once in a few decades.

cactuar.title: Cactuar
cactuar.description: A mysterious creature from Eorzea that looks like a cactus but is not. Releases 1000 needles when struck.

fauxticket.title: Faux Ticket
fauxticket.description: A ticket with a Mosswine and Felyne drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

fauxticketii.title: Faux Ticket II
fauxticketii.description: A ticket with a Wiggler and eyepatch drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

fauxticketiii.title: Faux Ticket III
fauxticketiii.description: A ticket with a Kulu-Ya-Ku drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

beetleticket.title: Beetle Ticket
beetleticket.description: A ticket with the heroic black ruler drawn on it. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

glamourprism.title: Glamour Prism
glamourprism.description: A strange stone that projects illusions. Show this to the Resource Center and...!?

incandescentweapon.title: Incandescent Weapon
incandescentweapon.description: A weapon carved from Kulve Taroth. Born from the fusion of rare metals. (Appraised after investigation)

kulvetarothemperornugget.title: Kulve Taroth Emperor Nugget
kulvetarothemperornugget.description: A glittering white gold nugget from Kulve Taroth. Bring it to the Smithy to craft new equipment!

leshenclaw.title: Leshen Claw
leshenclaw.description: A rare sharp leshen claw. One hit is enough to leave a deep gash on its victim.

ancientleshenclaw.title: Ancient Leshen Claw
ancientleshenclaw.description: Rare material. The claw of an ancient leshen, worshipped as an indigenous god in another world.

leshenskull.title: Leshen Skull
leshenskull.description: Proof of defeating a leshen. In another world, hunters hang this from their horse saddle to show off.

ancientleshenskull.title: Ancient Leshen Skull
ancientleshenskull.description: Rare ancient leshen material. Embued with powerful magic and harboring unfathomable darkness.

cursedbone.title: Cursed Bone
cursedbone.description: Rare material. The bone of a creature that fell prey to a leshen's cunning cruelty.

ancientcursedbone.title: Ancient Cursed Bone
ancientcursedbone.description: Rare ancient leshen material. A bone entangled in countless magical branches.

leshenantlers.title: Leshen Antlers
leshenantlers.description: Rare material. The horrifying antlers of a leshen, nourished by the innate powers of primeval woods.

ancientleshenantlers.title: Ancient Leshen Antlers
ancientleshenantlers.description: Rare ancient leshen material. Huge, solemn antlers that inspire fear in other creatures.

leshenresin.title: Leshen Resin
leshenresin.description: A lump of resin excreted by a leshen. Contains arcane components that should be handled with care.

mutagen.title: Mutagen
mutagen.description: A substance used to augment a witcher's abilities. Redeem at the Resource Center for something nice!?

nekkercard(weapon).title: Nekker Card (Weapon)
nekkercard(weapon).description: A gift from Geralt to the Endemic Life Researcher. Redeem at the Smithy for a Palico weapon.

nekkercard(armor).title: Nekker Card (Armor)
nekkercard(armor).description: A gift from Geralt to the Endemic Life Researcher. Redeem at the Smithy for Palico armor.

assassin'shood.title: Assassin's Hood
assassin'shood.description: Increases movement speed and allows you to hide quicker. Lets you deal big damage to monsters caught unaware.
